Title: HomeTrax - Manage Your Home By Barcode
Description:
HomeTrax allows you to track your personal items by UPC/Barcode. Making it easy to print grocery lists and manage your movie collection.

Built using .net 3.5 WPF (client), leverages UPCDatabase.com, and manages your personal inventory in SQL Server 2008 Express (backend).
